attributes.action: Increase the wage and better the working conditions for security operatives
attributes.additional_details: The wages in the security industry haven't gone up in 30 years infact they have gone down . We are petitioning for an increase in wages to to the increase in threat , the increased cost if living , the money we have to pay the sia(home office )  to work in the security industry and the cost of our dignity when it comes to conpanies exploiting our situations to pay sometimes below minimum wage .
attributes.background:
For the last 30 years door staff wages have dropped from 12 ph downt to some guys working for nmw .
People dont realise that as a security operative you are sometimes putting your life on the line . Is hospitalisation or in some cases death worth £10ph or less ???

rejection.details: The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the wage levels in the private security industry. You may wish to submit a petition asking for the Government to enforce the law relating to the minimum wage with respect to the security industry.
